attributes.action: Remove hotel quarantine for people who have had two doses of a Covid-19 vaccine.
attributes.additional_details: The government needs to take into account countries that are ahead of the UK with their vaccine roll outs. “Vaccine Passports” or similar are heading our way and it is unjust to penalise people mentally and financially if they have already had 2 doses of a Covid-19 vaccine when they are trying to return to the UK.
attributes.background: Remove the requirement for hotel quarantine for people entering/returning to the UK who have had two doses of a Covid-19 vaccine and have a certificate as proof of vaccine.
